summary: This document consists of a fax communication regarding legal requests directed to Cingular Wireless, including subscriber information related to specific phone numbers. It includes a subpoena from the State Attorney's Office in Palm Beach County, Florida, demanding records from Cingular Wireless. The document emphasizes confidentiality and outlines the legal obligations for compliance.

persons.name: Joe Recarey
persons.context: Joe Recarey is mentioned as the recipient of the fax communication from Cingular Wireless regarding legal requests.

persons.name: Beverly Thomas
persons.context: Beverly Thomas is identified as a subscriber associated with the phone number in question, with details about her account included in the document.

events.title: Request for Subscriber Information
events.description: A request was made to Cingular Wireless for subscriber information related to specific phone numbers.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: A subpoena was issued by the State Attorney's Office in Palm Beach County for records from Cingular Wireless.

keyFacts: The document contains a fax communication from Cingular Wireless regarding legal requests.
Joe Recarey from the Palm Beach Police Department is the recipient of the fax.
Beverly Thomas is identified as a subscriber associated with the phone number 561-635-3454.
A subpoena was issued for subscriber information related to specific phone numbers.
The document emphasizes confidentiality and legal compliance for the requested information.
